text: Please note that any comments or information that you post on the website, including the Hello Audio social media pages or groups, become public and third parties may use your information.

Hello Audio collects such information in order to send email relating to the services, respond to inquiries and requests, information regarding promotions or contests we may offer, oversee contests and promotions, information regarding account information, fulfill orders, deliver services and products, complete customer transactions, conduct our private, internal reporting for this site, security assessments, investigate legal claims, and improve website performance and customer service.

Hello Audio's systems may also automatically gather information about the areas you visit and search terms you use on this website and about the links you may select from within this website to other areas of the Internet.
We will inform you when we collect it whether you are required to provide the information to us.
* Email, call, or write to us * Provide us enough information to identify you (e.g., first and last name, email address, account number, user name, registration details)
We also use Web Beacons (i.e., Facebook pixel and Active Campaign) which are sometimes called single-pixel gifs or clear gifs.
We will hold all client and customer personal data in our files for six years.

Hello Audio may collect domain information and "cookies" (small files saved on your hard drive by your web browser) to analyze website and advertisement, performance, track user patterns, save information from your previous visits and customize your experience.
We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits.
Google utilizes the data collected to track and examine the use of this site, to prepare reports on its activities, and to share them with other Google services.

Hello Audio provides Users with information about the Listeners who have downloaded and streamed their content, including without limitation, how many times their content was downloaded and streamed.

We may also collect information based on your usage of this site which is information collected automatically from this site (or third party services employed in this site ), which can include: the IP addresses or domain names of the computers utilized by the users who use this site, the URI addresses (Uniform Resource Identifier), the time of the request, the method utilized to submit the request to the server, the size of the file received in response, the numerical code indicating the status of the server's answer (successful outcome, error, etc.), the country of origin, the features of the browser and the operating system utilized by the user, the various time details per visit (e.g., the time spent on each page within the site) and the details about the path followed within the site with special reference to the sequence of pages visited, other parameters about the device operating system and/or the user's IT environment, and data, conversion rates, marketing and conversion data and statistics, reports, analytics data, reviews and surveys ("Usage Data").
When a User registers and uploads Content to their feed on Hello Audio, the User will share the Listeners personal information with Hello Audio.
We will hold non-user personal data until you let us know you would like for us to delete it or unsubscribe from our marketing contacts, which you are free to do at any time.
We do, however, share your name and email address with our analytics service providers, third-party suppliers and credit card processors.
